values.value:
Dear {{1}},
Greetings from the Runwal Group,
This is to inform you that we have tried reaching you on your registered number, however your number is not reachable. We request you to kindly call us back on Customer care number {{2}} to speak with your relationship manager from your registered number. You can also write to us on {{3}} We thank you for buying your dream home with us and look forward to serving you.
Regards, Runwal Group
